foreignData.name: Gehirnentfernung
foreignData.text:
Opfere eine Kreatur als zusätzliche Kosten, um Gehirnentfernung zu spielen.
Ein Spieler deiner Wahl zeigt die Karten auf seiner Hand offen vor und wirft alle davon ab, die eine der Farben der geopferten Kreatur haben.

foreignData.name: Extraction cérébrale
foreignData.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour jouer l'Extraction cérébrale, sacrifiez une créature.
Le joueur ciblé révèle sa main et se défausse de toutes les cartes de chacune des couleurs de la créature sacrifiée.

foreignData.name: Estrazione Mentale
foreignData.text:
Come costo addizionale per giocare l'Estrazione Mentale, sacrifica una creatura.
Il giocatore bersaglio rivela la propria mano e scarta da essa tutte le carte che hanno almeno un colore in comune con la creatura sacrificata.

name: Mind Extraction
originalText:
As an additional cost to play Mind Extraction, sacrifice a creature.
Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards of each of the sacrificed creature's colors from it.

rulings.text: If you sacrifice a colorless creature, you get to see their hand but they discard no cards.
If you sacrifice a multicolored creature, all cards that share at least one color with the creature are discarded.
You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you cannot cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you cannot sacrifice additional creatures.
Players can only respond once this spell has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature you sacrificed to prevent you from casting this spell.
